welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Seabrook, a charming coastal town known for its beautiful beaches and warm hospitality. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and shops.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest of the three terminals, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The smallest terminal, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport for up to 45 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BWI Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at BWI Airport serves domestic flights for airlines such as Southwest and Alaska Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at BWI Airport serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at BWI Airport serves international flights for airlines such as British Airways and Condor.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers a more luxurious and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport terminal.
